overview: Are you ready for a 100% Italian ALL YOU CAN EAT PUSSY buffet? Because that's exactly what you get served in SWINGERS PARADISE, a non stop fuck fest featuring Italy's horniest swingers. Directed by Robbie Bianchi an brought to you by LETSDOEIT productions, 2018 XBIZ AWARD WINNER, nobody handles a cock like an Italian Mamma!
title: Swingers Paradise
